participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

prosocial_q1_p.Description: My child is… Considerate of other people's feelings. /Tiene consideración por los sentimientos de los demás. | 0 = Not True/ Falso; 1 = Somewhat True /Algo cierto; 2 = Certainly True /Totalmente cierto//For each item, please mark the box for Not True, Somewhat True, or Certainly True. It would help us if you answered all items as best you can even if you are not absolutely certain. Please give your answers on the basis of  the child's behavior over the last six months or this school year

Levels.2: Certainly True /Totalmente cierto//For each item, please mark the box for Not True, Somewhat True, or Certainly True. It would help us if you answered all items as best you can even if you are not absolutely certain. Please give your answers on the basis of  the child's behavior over the last six months or this school year

prosocial_q2_p.Description: My child is… Helpful if someone is hurt, upset, or feeling ill. /Ayuda cuando alguien se lastima, se molesta o se siente enfermo. | 0 = Not True/ Falso; 1 = Somewhat True /Algo cierto; 2 = Certainly True /Totalmente cierto//For each item, please mark the box for Not True, Somewhat True, or Certainly True. It would help us if you answered all items as best you can even if you are not absolutely certain. Please give your answers on the basis of  the child's behavior over the last six months or this school year

Levels.2: Certainly True /Totalmente cierto//For each item, please mark the box for Not True, Somewhat True, or Certainly True. It would help us if you answered all items as best you can even if you are not absolutely certain. Please give your answers on the basis of  the child's behavior over the last six months or this school year

prosocial_q3_p.Description: My child is… Often offers to help others (parents, teachers, other children). /Con frecuencia se ofrece para ayudar a los demás (padres, maestros, otros niños). | 0 = Not True/ Falso; 1 = Somewhat True /Algo cierto; 2 = Certainly True /Totalmente cierto//For each item, please mark the box for Not True, Somewhat True, or Certainly True. It would help us if you answered all items as best you can even if you are not absolutely certain. Please give your answers on the basis of  the child's behavior over the last six months or this school year

Levels.2: Certainly True /Totalmente cierto//For each item, please mark the box for Not True, Somewhat True, or Certainly True. It would help us if you answered all items as best you can even if you are not absolutely certain. Please give your answers on the basis of  the child's behavior over the last six months or this school year

psb_p_ss_mean.Description: Prosocial Behavior Subscale Mean of Parent Report on Youth: (prosocial_q1_p + prosocial_q2_p + prosocial_q3_p)/3; Validation: Minimum of two items answered | Goodman, R. (1997) The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: a research note. J Child Psychol Psychiatry 38(5):581-6; Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey V. (1998) The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study of the validity of the self-report version. European Child and Adolescent Psychiatry 7: 125-13.

psb_p_ss_mean_nm.Description: Prosocial Behavior Subscale, Mean of Parent Report on Youth: Number Missing Answers

psb_p_ss_mean_nt.Description: Prosocial Behavior Subscale, Mean of Parent report on Youth: Number Total Questions

psb_p_ss_answered.Description: Prosocial Behavior Subscale, Mean of Parent Report on Youth: Number Answered
